name: OneScreen
tag_list: online-video-platform, video-advertising, content-distribution, social-media, video-enabling, distributed-video-player, content-syndication, in-stream-advertising
overview: OneScreen is a digital video solutions provider that partners with three key stakeholders: producers and aggregators, publishers and networks, and advertisers and agencies. Offering innovative and comprehensive technology products and services that each stakeholder needs, OneScreen builds and streamlines their connections with each other. Together, OneScreenâ€™s ecosystem gives people more access to watch content where, when, and how they want.
